plays.text: Goal scored by Jay Pandolfo assisted by John Madden AND Sergei Brylin
Penalty to Nick Tarnasky 2 minutes for Slashing Travis Zajac
Penalty to Sergei Brylin 2 minutes for Tripping Martin St. Louis
Goal scored by Brad Richards assisted by Paul Ranger
Penalty to Dan Boyle 2 minutes for Holding Zach Parise
Penalty to Erik Rasmussen 2 minutes for Tripping Ruslan Fedotenko
Penalty to Brad Lukowich 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Colin White 2 minutes for Hooking Nikita Alexeev
Goal scored by Brad Richards assisted by Dan Boyle AND Martin St. Louis
Penalty to Eric Perrin 2 minutes for Holding Zach Parise
Goal scored by Paul Martin assisted by Zach Parise AND Brian Rafalski
Penalty to Filip Kuba 2 minutes for Hooking Scott Gomez
Zach Parise shootout attempt against Johan Holmqvist with a Backhand results in a SAVE!
Brad Richards shootout attempt against Martin Brodeur with a Wristshot results in a GOAL!
Brian Gionta shootout attempt against Johan Holmqvist with a Wide of Net results in a MISS!
Martin St. Louis shootout attempt against Martin Brodeur with a Backhand results in a SAVE!
Patrik Elias shootout attempt against Johan Holmqvist with a Wide of Net results in a MISS!
Vincent Lecavalier shootout attempt against Martin Brodeur with a Hit Crossbar results in a MISS!
